```{r}
options(digits = 0)
countIds <- drake::readd(counted_ids_KEY, cache = cache)
countTime <- drake::readd(counted_time_KEY, cache = cache)

kable(countIds[, .(species = matched_name, family, class)])

kable(cbind(countIds[, .(sensor_type_id, nID = nIndividual, 
												 nDeploy = nDeployment, nTag, nRows)],
						countTime[, .(lenStudy, nYear = nYears)]
))
```

```{r}
nas <- drake::readd(nas_KEY, cache = cache)
kable(data.table::data.table(col = names(nas), `% NA` = 100 * as.numeric(nas))[
	col %in% c('individual_id', 'location_lat', 'location_long')
])
```
